      • size

        public static double size(DGraph<java.lang.String> graph,
          DGraph<java.lang.String> sub,
          java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> occurrences,
          boolean storeLabels,
          Compressor<Graph<java.lang.String>> comp)
        Parameters:
        graph -
        sub -
        occurrences -
        storeLabels - Whether to explicitly store the node labels. If false, a distinguishing code will still be stored for each node, but the actual string will not be recoverable. If the nodes should also not be distinguishable by label, the graph should be blanked first.
        comp -
        Returns:
